channel.title: Health
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Health, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Too Much Sugar Does to Your Body
item.description: Chances are you already know that eating too much sugar isn’t good for you. Yet you’re probably still overdoing it. Americans average about 270 calories of added sugars each day. That’s about 17 teaspoons a day, compared to the recommended limits of about 12 teaspoon per day or 200 calories.
